attributes.action: Flush out all White Supremacist Racist Terrorists in Trustee, Directorship, Executive and Senior Management
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What do you think is the best way to flush out these White Supremacist, Racist, Terrorist, Saboteurs in Trustee, Directorship, Executive and Senior Management positions in Institutionally Racist organisations and Public Services infested with these White Supremacist, Racist, Terrorist, Saboteurs and stop their impact on the management of resources necessary for the delivery of community cohesion, religious diversity and community development?

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
